newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT - Amersham raised at NatWest.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Amersham raised at NatWest.

text.p: Amersham International Plc was raised to a "buy" from a "hold" at NatWest Securities, market sources said on Wednesday.

Sources said the upgrade mainly reflected improving prospcts for Amersham's healthcare products, mainly its heart treatment Myoview. NatWest expects 1997 sales of the product to expand from 20 million stg in 1997 to 45 million by the year 2000.
Overall the brokerage raised its forecast for Amersham's compound earnings growth to 17 percent through the end of the century, sources said.
Analysts at the brokerage were not immediately available for comment.
Amersham shares were down 12-1/2p at 12.15 stg by 1117 GMT, extending a steady decline since they peaked at 13.45 stg on February 13.
